message.body: those bassist you gave me, do they play standards gigs? I'm assuming yes, just making sure.... don't you do lessons at g.c. Thursdays?
John thompson not often but yes, the rest yes. I do do lessons til 7 on thursdays.
ah that's too bad cus I'd love to have you on those gigs.let me know if you can ever make a 6pm gig and you got it c:
